member.name: WAVEFILTER
member.summary: The WAVEFILTER structure defines a filter for waveform-audio data. Only filter information common to all waveform-audio data filters is included in this structure. For filters that require additional information, this structure is included as the first member in another structure along with the additional information.

member.name: WAVEFILTER.cbStruct
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the WAVEFILTER structure. The size specified in this member must be large enough to contain the base WAVEFILTER structure.

member.name: WAVEFILTER.dwFilterTag
member.summary: Waveform-audio filter type. Filter tags are registered with Microsoft Corporation for various filter algorithms.

member.name: WAVEFILTER.fdwFilter
member.summary: Flags for the dwFilterTag member. The flags defined for this member are universal to all filters. Currently, no flags are defined.

member.name: WAVEFILTER.dwReserved
member.summary: Reserved for system use; should not be examined or modified by an application.
